## EthersLiquity.withdrawLUSDFromStabilityPool() method

Withdraw LUSD from Stability Deposit.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
withdrawLUSDFromStabilityPool(amount: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<StabilityDepositChangeDetails>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./arth-lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of LUSD to withdraw. |
|  overrides | [EthersTransactionOverrides](./arth-lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[StabilityDepositChangeDetails](./arth-lib-base.stabilitydepositchangedetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [EthersTransactionFailedError](./arth-lib-ethers.etherstransactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the Stability Deposit's [collateral gain](./arth-lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) and [LQTY reward](./arth-lib-base.stabilitydeposit.lqtyreward.md)<!-- -->.
